column4: Can anyone recommend a good webdav client for ubuntu? (Ie, installable through apt-get)
nautilus and konqueror are goog clients for webdav
Nautilus webdav is broken in hardy as far as I can tell.. I can try konqueror though.
nautilus reports sometimes error messages when using webdav, however, as far as I can tell, even with this error messages it works when you use bookmarks or in the menu Places->Connect to server
